experiences.title: IT Speicalist Intern
experiences.subtitle: Hialeah Gardens Elementary
workDescription: Established a walk-in IT station, reducing downtime and improving system performance for 50+ faculty/staff by 30%.
Implemented proactive maintenance schedules and upgraded network infrastructure, reducing system downtime by 20%.
Collaborated with educators to integrate new technology solutions into classrooms, enhancing the educational experience and ensuring compatibility with existing systems.
